argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumval.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumval.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumval.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsumval.o | |- O = { s e. B | A. t e. B ( ( s .+ t ) = t /\ ( t .+ s ) = t ) } |
| 5 |  | gsumval.w | |- ( ph -> W = ( `' F " ( _V \ O ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | gsumval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. V ) |
| 7 |  | gsumval.a | |- ( ph -> A e. X ) |
| 8 |  | gsumval.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fex2 | |- ( ( F : A --> B /\ A e. X /\ B e. _V ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 13 | 8, 7, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> F e. _V ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( F : A --> B -> dom F = A ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom F = A ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 13, 15 | #P_gsumvalx | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = if ( ran F C_ O , .0. , if ( A e. ran ... , ( iota x E. m E. n e. ( ZZ>= ` m ) ( A = ( m ... n ) /\ x = ( seq m ( .+ , F ) ` n ) ) ) , ( iota x E. f ( f : ( 1 ... ( # ` W ) ) -1-1-onto-> W /\ x = ( seq 1 ( .+ , ( F o. f ) ) ` ( # ` W ) ) ) ) ) ) ) |
